articles.title: Mirrors That Detect Ripples in Space-Time Were Frozen to Near Absolute Zero
articles.description: A team of physicists say they’ve managed to nearly freeze the motion of atoms across four suspended mirrors. It’s a mind-twisting feat that strains the very definitions of seemingly simple words like “object” and “temperature.” So buckle up.Read more...
